name: Basculin
flavorText:
Red and blue Basculin get along so
poorly, they’ll start fighting instantly.
These Pokémon are very hostile.
formDescription: Forms have one different ability and different wild held items.  Blue-Striped Basculin are rarer in Black Version and Black Version 2, and Red-Striped Basculin in White Version and White Version 2.
